import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add category to site"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/categories/{categoryId}/site"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Enables an asset category for the current site and applies the site options provided in the request body (for example, role visibility or other category settings).

**Prerequisites**
1. **categoryId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets/categories/site](/docs/api/assets/get-available-asset-categories) to identify the category to manage.

**Workflow Example**
1. List categories: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/categories/site](/docs/api/assets/get-available-asset-categories) -&gt; capture `CategoryId` from the response.
2. Enable the category: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/categories/\{categoryId\}/site](/docs/api/assets/add-category-to-site) with an `AssetCategorySiteOptionsRequest` array of `EntitySiteOption` entries.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `categoryId` (path) and at least one `EntitySiteOption` in the request body.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"categoryId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the category","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"EntitySiteOptionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"EntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"RoleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"IsDefaultForEntityType":{"type":"boolean"},"Enabled":{"type":"boolean"},"ChildrenEnabledByDefault":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true}},"example":{"EntitySiteOptionId":"f1e2d3c4-b5a6-7890-f1e2-d3c4b5a67890","ProductId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-a1b2-c3d4e5f67890","SiteId":"e5f6a7b8-c9d0-1234-e5f6-a7b8c9d01234","Enabled":true},"title":"EntitySiteOption"},"title":"AssetCategorySiteOptionsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
